name: controls.core.ActivityManager
text: @param name:string activity name to replace     @param intent:Object activity initial data object     @param state:Object activity initial state object     replace current top activity with new one

keepLastActivity.text: allow to keep last activity on screen or not

replaceTopActivity.text: replace current top activity with new one

push.text: push new activity to the top

closeAllExcept.text: close all activities in stack except 'name' activity

pop.text: pop top 'count' activities from the stack top

params.name: count
params.text: activities count to pop from stack

params.name: name
params.text: activity name to be removed from stack

popWithState.text: pop top activity and send 'state' to the next activity

params.name: name
params.text: activity that state will be changed

params.name: name
params.text: activity that state will be changed

isActivityInStack.text: check is 'name' activity in stack or not

params.name: name
params.text: activity that state will be changed
